evaliscert.label: Evaliscert
evaliscert.challengeDesc: A third-party auditor handling dozens of cases monthly. Each document required 3-4 hours of manual processing. Client acquisition depended on expensive external marketing agencies, with no control over results.
evaliscert.solutionDesc: We automated the entire document workflow while ensuring full compliance and privacy regulations. Then we built a fully autonomous outreach and lead generation system. Today each case takes 10 minutes. New clients come in without intermediaries.

fashion.label: Fashion Franchise
fashion.challengeDesc: A retail chain with physical stores and an online shop. Inventory managed manually, orders getting lost between channels, slow shipping to customers and suppliers. Every sale required too many manual steps.
fashion.solutionDesc: Complete automation of the online store: from order to shipping, zero human intervention. Inventory synced in real-time between physical and digital. Sales and logistics management unified into a single automated flow.

realestate.label: Real Estate Agency
realestate.challengeDesc: Thousands of contacts in the CRM, but most of them dormant. No system to reactivate cold leads. Contracts, privacy documents, and invoices managed through emails and spreadsheets. Time wasted, opportunities missed.
realestate.solutionDesc: We built an automated system for lead reactivation, qualification, and nurturing. Every contact is followed up without manual intervention. Document management—contracts, privacy forms, reports, invoices—is now fully automated.

aboutUs.storyP1: Axialoop wasn't born in an accelerator or from a pitch deck. It was born from urgency.
aboutUs.storyP2: When my father's company was struggling, I realized the problem wasn't lack of effort. It was time: devoured by emails, documents, data entry, bureaucracy. Hours that never came back.
aboutUs.storyP3: I started automating. One process at a time. No revolutions, just concrete solutions. Within months, that company started breathing again.
aboutUs.storyP4: Today Axialoop replicates that journey for Italian SMEs. We don't sell hype. We sell time and growth.
aboutUs.missionContent: To democratize artificial intelligence for small and medium-sized Italian enterprises. To transform complex technologies into simple, accessible, and sustainable tools. To free entrepreneurs from the slavery of repetitive tasks, so they can get back to what matters: growing their business.

FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequent questions about our AI automation services.

items.question: What is Axialoop and what do you offer to SMEs?
items.answer: Axialoop is an AI automation agency specialized for small and medium-sized enterprises. We analyze your business processes, identify repetitive tasks that steal time from your employees, and automate them with tailored solutions. The result? Less data entry, fewer errors, more time to grow your business.

items.question: Is automation suitable for my business?
items.answer: If someone in your company spends hours copying data, sorting emails, managing documents, or answering the same questions, then yes. We work with law firms, logistics companies, certification bodies, manufacturing, and any business with repetitive processes. You don't need to be a tech company: you just need to want your time back.

items.question: How does your consulting and automation process work?
items.answer: It's simple: you tell us where you're losing time, we identify what can be automated. We start with a free call to understand your needs, then present a plan with clear priorities and estimated ROI. Once we agree, we implement step-by-step without disrupting your existing processes.

items.question: How much does it cost and when will I see results?
items.answer: Every project is different, but our goal is always the same: help you recover your investment within months. We show you upfront how many hours you'll save and what that time is worth in euros. We don't sell vague promises: we sell concrete numbers.

items.question: How can I start working with Axialoop?
items.answer: Book a free 30-minute call. You tell us how you work today, we tell you what can be improved. Zero commitment, zero hard selling. If it makes sense for both of us, we move forward. If not, you'll still walk away with useful ideas.
